page.title: 18A day on a farm
page.content: 5.00 Rise and shine 5.15-8.00 Milk the cows,feed and clean them, 8.00-8.30 Breakfast 8.30-12.00 Feed calves,clean byres collect hay to bring indoors ,check cattle for signs of illness.Check machinery,do any repairs.Tanker collects milk. 12-1.00 Lunch.Bacon hotpot and rice pudding 1.00-3.15 General farmwork,could be fencing or ploughing. 3.15-5.20 Cows brought in and milked again. Byres and machines cleaned. 5.20-6.00 Tea.It is well earned Onthis particular day there was no extra work to do so the farmer could have an evening with his wife and family.Often he has to work.
